bioconda.name: soapsplice
bioconda.summary: We have developed a tool SOAPsplice for genome-wide ab initio detection of splice junction sites from RNA-Seq, a method using new generation sequencing technologies to sequence the messenger RNA.

biocontainers.name: soapsplice
biocontainers.summary: We have developed a tool soapsplice for genome-wide ab initio detection of splice junction sites from rna-seq, a method using new generation sequencing technologies to sequence the messenger rna.

biotools.summary: Designed to use RNA-Seq reads for genome-wide ab initio detection of splice junction sites and identification of alternative splicing (AS) events.

bioschemas.name: SOAPsplice
bioschemas.summary: Designed to use RNA-Seq reads for genome-wide ab initio detection of splice junction sites and identification of alternative splicing (AS) events.
